articles.author: Leonie Kijewski, Jacopo Barigazzi
articles.title: EU Commission scratches Russia nuclear sanctions plans - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy had urged the EU to sanction Rosatom, the Russian state nuclear energy company.
articles.content:
The European Commission has abandoned plans to sanction Russia's nuclear sector or its representatives in its next sanctions package, three diplomats told POLITICO on Thursday.
The EU executive init… [+1824 chars]

articles.title: Spain menstrual leave: Paid time off for women who suffer from painful periods • FRANCE 24 English - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: In Spain, women are due to benefit from a first here in Europe menstrual leave paid for by the state. Spanish women who suffer from painful periods are set t...
